text:
1. Hold the yo-yo in your dominant hand.
2. Extend your arm out in front of you.
3. Give the yo-yo a gentle downward throw.
4. Allow the yo-yo to reach the end of the string and then pull it back up.
5. Repeat steps 3 and 4 in a smooth and controlled motion.
6. Practice different tricks such as "Around the World" or "Walk the Dog" by manipulating the yo-yo's movements.
7. Experiment with various hand motions and string manipulations to create unique yo-yo tricks.
